meaningMnemonic: There is <kanji>fault</kanji> in your <kanji>hope</kanji>. It breaks, and everything falls apart. You feel massive <vocabulary>disappointment</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>despair</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
